title: Wheat in Whitehorse  how climate change helps feed Canada s remote regions
description: After failing to grow wheat in Canada s subarctic Yukon territory   years ago  farmer Steve Mackenzie Grieve gave it another shot in
content: After failing to grow wheat in Canada s subarctic Yukon territory   years ago farmerSteve Mackenzie Grieve gave it another shot in   Thanks to longer summers  he has reaped three straight harvests  This spring he plans to sow canola on his family s      chars
